Welcome to a Roadtrips, the Ultimate in Sports Travel

For almost 30 years, we’ve been designing personalized luxury travel experiences to the biggest and most sought-after sporting events in the world. We take great pride in providing all our guests with unique and memorable sports travel experiences that create lifetime memories. Our knowledgeable team takes care of all the small details to allow our guests to relax and enjoy the incredible atmosphere surrounding these premier events and their fascinating host cities.

In order to create the best possible experience for our guests, our preparation begins years in advance of events like the World Cup, the Super Bowl, and the Summer and Winter Games. We visit the host cities to scout out the finest hotels, interview local partners, and test out transportation options. In the process, we have fun discovering which restaurants, attractions, and shops are worth recommending.

We want your sports travel experience to be absolutely perfect for you. Our personalized packages are curated using your choice of distinctive accommodations, VIP viewing and hospitality options, exclusive parties, and a long list of other possibilities that cater to even the most discerning traveler.

All of our packages come complete with personal concierge services, and our professional onsite host team is available to make sure our guests are completely taken care of at all of our major events. When you travel with Roadtrips, you can be confident that you’ll be well looked after by one of the leaders in the industry. Backed by our years of experience and commitment to excellence, we will take care of all the logistics so you can immerse yourself in the best sports travel experience ever.
